column4: does anyone know if theres a file where a list of file types and their associated programs?
captain morgan: its for a project, im writing a new file manager, and when the user clicks on a file, say .pdf i want the associate app to open
like what i want to know is if say i clicked on a pdf it opens up pdfview, but how does it know to open that up?
preferred applications isnt what i want
unless theres a generic command to open files?
im writing my own file manager
what are you writing your manager in?  C++?
yep tis gonna be very hard!
sounds tough.  why are you doing it?
why not, challenging project, hasnt been done fully before
oh, well good luck.  is the project open source or proprietary?
closed source for now, until its finished, then i'll me making it open
ah.  well, best of luck with it :)
